name: Nono Pixie
overview: Nono Pixie is a Nonogram Puzzle Game for Commodore 64 with 100 unique puzzles to solve! A Nonogram is a puzzle that tells how many squares are in each row and column of a picture. If there are multiple groups in a column or row this is indicated by multiple numbers for the same column or row. Released as part of the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Development Competition 2019.
